title: Interpretation of seeing a chicken chick in a dream: seeing eating a chicken chick with sauce

preview.html: Interpretation of a chicken chick for a married woman, a single woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether it is roasted or fried. The vision of eating chicken meat and the death of chicks, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a chicken in a dream: A chicken chick in a dream indicates profit in which there is exhaustion and problems. Whoever sees that he is eating raw chicken, he will crush the nobles of the slaves, and chicken meat in general indicates an abundance of money. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about chicks that they symbolize joy, happiness, and freedom from worry. Chicks in a dream also symbolize health and lawful money. Whoever sees chickens in In his dream, the dream indicates that he will become the owner of a large project without trouble and fatigue. Perhaps a chick in a dream indicates a good reputation for the dreamer and people’s love for him. As for whoever saw a chick in his dream and was suffering from some disease, the dream promises him good news of a quick recovery from his illness. As for someone who was going through severe distress and saw chicks in his dream, he is promised good news of the death of worry and relief from God Almighty. As for someone who quarreled between himself and someone and saw chicks in a dream, his dream indicates peace and the end of the fighting. As for whoever saw in his dream that he was feeding chicks, His dream indicates that he is living a cohesive and happy family life. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is playing with chicks, the dream indicates that he will have a child and will spend his time playing and enjoying it. As for the one who sees in his dream a chick giving birth, his dream shows something that the dreamer expected and will come true. Interpretation of chicks in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees chicks in her dream, this symbolizes a happy family life. But if a married woman sees in her dream that a chick emerges from the egg, then her dream is considered good news for a new pregnancy. Interpretation of chicks in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams indicates a vision of seeing Chicks in a dream for single women in general indicate success and good luck. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a chick emerging from the egg, then her dream indicates that she will leave her father’s house and move to her husband’s house. Interpretation of chicks in a dream for a pregnant woman. Whoever sees a chick in his dream, it symbolizes To a healthy child. But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream a chick emerging from the egg, then her dream is good news for an easy birth process. Interpretation of chicks in a dream for a man: Seeing a chick emerging from the egg in a dream indicates that his wife will become pregnant soon, which will give birth to many children. Healthy people. As for seeing a certain number of chicks, it means that he will obtain livelihood and comfort with the availability of understanding among his family. Interpretation of a chick hatching from an egg in a dream: Seeing a chick hatching from an egg in one dream means marriage soon. Also, seeing divorced and widowed chicks hatching also indicates marriage. Seeing chicks emerging from the egg shows that there are many children in reality. Interpretation of a yellow chick in a dream: Whoever sees a yellow chick in his dream, his dream shows food and hears good news. Whoever waits for something and wants it and sees a yellow chick in his dream will get what he wished for. Interpretation of the white chick in Dream: Whoever sees white chicks in his dream, symbolizes finding and fulfilling his other half

title: Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: We will study with you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream in detail. Dreams are considered a group of visual situations that a person sees during his sleep, which are usually a reflection of that person’s reality and his present that he always carries. Within its manifestations are many symbols and signs that indicate a group of things that will actually happen in the life of its owner. Between good and bad omens, people are always looking for interpretations of their dreams to know what the future holds for them, so we present to you the interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin from Encyclopedia website.Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream. The meaning of seeing an old friend in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicated in his book that the interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream varies according to the psychological state and social circumstances of the dreamer, in addition to his great dependence on the condition of the old friend in the events. . In a dream, happiness is different from sadness or crying, and so on... Seeing an old friend in a dream generally indicates a longing for memories and the past in the dreamer’s soul and his desire to return his life to what it was like in his childhood. Seeing an old friend in a dream means that the dreamer does not He pities his relatives and that he is alone and isolated and does not love his family, friends or acquaintances. Whoever sees in a dream that he sees his old friend in good condition, full of joy and happiness, not worried or sick, this indicates the soonest date of meeting this friend in reality. Whoever sees his old friend In a dream, he is in good health, this indicates that this friend thinks with insight as he thinks about him, and his strong desire to meet him and talk to him. While seeing an old friend sick and feeling pain in the dream indicates that this friend is suffering from fears, problems, and obstacles in his real life. Also, seeing the friend An old person being sick could mean that this person is actually sick and suffers from recurring health crises, and God knows best. Seeing an old friend sick shows his intense need to ask for help from you and those around him, but he does not speak asking for help out of shame or abandonment, and God knows best. Seeing old classmates in a dream Seeing old classmates in a dream means that the dreamer is going through a state of stress and tension during this period, or He is going through a transitional phase in his life that causes him a lot of thinking and stress, so he comes to see his school friends. To help him get through this stage and overcome the problems he faces these days. Seeing classmates in a dream also indicates that there is great hope in the dreamer’s life that directs him to improve circumstances and achieve what he wants soon. And when one sees his old friend in a dream in an unfamiliar and different way than If he saw him in reality, as if he appeared as an animal or non-human, then this vision indicates that many problems will arise between the dreamer and his dreamer. If you see pigs rolling in the mud, this indicates problems and tension at the level of friends and decline in business. But if a girl dreams of this dream, she should pay attention to the presence of fake friends around her who are jealous of her, and she will meet a jealous and greedy friend, even though he will become rich. If you eat pork in a dream, it means that you will face real problems, but if you see only one pig, it means that you will emerge victorious from problems and conflicts. If you see pigs and piglets, it means abundant crops for the farmer and progress for others. If you hear the sound of pigs, it means disturbing news of absent friends and portends disappointment due to death or failure to estimate the amounts you expected from important business deals. If you dream that you are feeding your pigs, this means an increase in your personal property. If you dream that you are trading pigs, you will accumulate great wealth, but you will have to work hard and hard to achieve it. Another interpretation of the symbol of the appearance of a pig in your dream: The pig is one of the animals that we hate and has a status in it as Muslims, and seeing it in a dream has somewhat different connotations than what we witness in reality. If you see a pig in a dream, it means that you will emerge victorious from problems. Seeing pigs rolling in the mud indicates stress, especially in social relationships, and decline in business. To see fat and strong pigs in a dream, it means renewal of changes in work and success. On the other hand, thin pigs indicate To the presence of problems. Seeing small pigs in a dream indicates progress and improvement in conditions and abundant crops for farmers. As for its possession, it represents worries and sorrows. As for entering the house, it indicates the attention of the authorities. Feeding pigs in a dream indicates an increase in your personal possessions. To hear pigs squealing in a dream, means that you will hear disturbing news from absent friends. It can also indicate disappointment in a matter due to failure or the death of a family or close friend. Screaming can indicate Pigs indicate miscalculation by negotiators, which may lead to failure. Eating pork in a dream means that you will face real problems in your life. It indicates forbidden money and committing sins. Trading pigs indicates wealth that comes from hard work and long-term hard work. Raising and caring for pigs in a dream suggests That you believe that you are humble Andal people. If you ride a pig in a dream, it means that you will defeat your enemy, fighting pigs, yes.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing cold and snow in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cold and snow in a dream has many promising connotations and meanings for its owners, and in order to know the negative interpretations of this subject, it is necessary to release the interpretations of scholars on this subject. Seeing cold and snow in a dream. Seeing cold and snow in a dream at the wrong time indicates many problems that he will suffer from in the coming days and will be very sad. If a person sees cold and snow during his sleep, this is a sign that he will find an opportunity to work outside the country, but he He will face many difficulties. If the dreamer sees hail and snow falling on him in his dream, this indicates that he is facing his enemies and is able to resist them with great strength. The dreamer seeing in a dream, hail and snow symbolizes his ability to reach the things he wants after overcoming the obstacles that were in him. His way. Seeing hail and snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of hail and snow in a dream as a sign that he will lose a lot of money in the coming days, because he cannot deal well with the problems he was facing. If one sees in his dream hail and snow in His home, then this is a sign of the loss of a loved one, and sadness will fall upon everyone after that. If the dreamer during his sleep sees cold and snow falling on him and overwhelming him, this expresses his ability to defeat his enemies and get rid of them once and for all. The dreamer’s vision in a dream about hail and snow in abundance , symbolizes the many money he will receive, which will greatly improve his living situation. Seeing cold and snow in a single woman’s dream Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about cold and snow indicates good things that will happen in her life in the coming days, which will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees While he is sleeping in cold and snow, this is a sign that he will be able to achieve many things that she dreamed of achieving and she will be proud of herself for what she will achieve. In case the dreamer sees cold and snow in his dream, this means that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from someone who suits her well and she will agree immediately. The vision A girl in her dream about cold and snow symbolizes the positive changes that will occur in her life in the coming days and which she will be very satisfied with. Seeing snow in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees snow in her dream, this is a sign of the happy life that she will enjoy in the coming days as a result of her desire In avoiding anything that makes her feel uncomfortable. If the dreamer sees snow in her dream, this represents her excelling in her studies to a great extent and obtaining the highest grades that make her people very proud of her. Seeing a sleeping girl eating snow symbolizes the abundance of money that she will obtain and will make She lives her life the way she likes. Seeing snow in a dream indicates the happy news that she will receive that will make her very happy. What is the interpretation of seeing snow melting in a single woman’s dream? Seeing a single woman melting snow in her dream indicates her ability to overcome many of the difficulties that have hindered her life In days

title: The dead in a dream and seeing relatives of the dead, inspired by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream includes multiple meanings, and every detail of the dream of the dead is important, such as his clothes, appearance, and the way he speaks to the dreamer, and was the dreamer given something in the dream or taken from him? These subtle symbols carry many important interpretations for the dreamer, and in the following paragraphs we will show you the most important things that Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi said about this vision. The dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dead in dreams The jurists agreed that the interpretation of the dream of the deceased indicates livelihood if the deceased is one of the believers in God who does good deeds and suppresses their desires, and the dream may indicate God's wrath on the dreamer if he sees a dead person. A non-believer in his dream, and he speaks to him at length, but this indication is not the only one specific to seeing the dead, and the most important visions that dreamers see are summarized in the following points: Smiling dead: The smile of the deceased, whether he is a relative or a stranger, for the first time the dreamer sees it in his dream, the vision shows good fortunes and many good things that accompany the dreamer in his life. The dead goes to Hajj: When one sees in a dream that the deceased is performing the Hajj rituals, he died in obedience to God, and because of his many deeds in the world, God gave him a high position in heaven, and the dream may indicate either the dreamer’s marriage or his marriage. If he performs Hajj, especially if he sees that he went to perform Hajj with the dead, he returns to his home again. The dead group asks the dreamer: When the dreamer sees dead people asking about him by their names, standing at the door of his house and waiting for him to come out and take him and leave, death is approaching and the dreamer will leave life as soon as possible. The deceased is sick and needs medicine: The sickness of the deceased is evidence of his disobedience to God in this world, and the medicine he asks for is evidence of his need for charity and supplication, and the dreamer giving medicine to the deceased is evidence that he made a lot of charity for him. Until God stops torturing this dead person and provides him with safety and stability in his grave. The dead person is hungry and asks for food. When the dead person is hungry in a dream, this is evidence that his family has forgotten him, and they have not fulfilled their duty towards him in terms of supplication and zakat. If the fortune teller gives him food, the dream shows a message directed to the dreamer and must be applied, so that the deceased asks for charity from him and not from anyone else, and he must do so. The dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The dead person in Ibn Sirin’s dream indicates good news and warnings according to what he said to the dreamer in the dream. When the dead person embraces the monarch in a dream, and the embrace continues for a long time, this is a long and happy life for the monarch, provided that he does not refuse to embrace this deceased person, or if he feels distressed and contemptuous. If the deceased was seen in the dream preaching to the dreamer and the dreamer was a good listener to this advice, then the vision indicates a clear modification in the dreamer’s behavior as he seeks forgiveness from the Lord of the Worlds and turns to Him and leaves the path of fallacy that has continued for many years. The dead in the dream of singles When the dreamer hears the voice of his deceased mother or father screaming for help, but he did not see him in the dream, he is tormented and asks her to save him from this torment with her good deeds

title: Interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream: wearing a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the hijab for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, black or white, takes off the dress, buys a new torn one, and an old, colored one for a man according to Ibn Sirin. The hijab is a symbol of purity and concealment if it appears in a woman’s dream, while it is a sign of good luck in a man’s dream. In general, seeing A veil in a dream is a good thing, as it is evidence of calm, stability, livelihood, and money, especially if that veil is made of silk. The veil in an unmarried girl’s dream is a strong indicator that she will get married soon, especially if the color of this veil is white. Seeing single women wearing the hijab is a symbol of success and positive change to come. The hijab can also indicate the purity of her heart and the purity of her soul. As for buying a hijab in a dream, it is a sign of a close connection, and seeing taking off the hijab symbolizes separation or failure. As for a married woman, seeing The veil in her dream is a sign and symbol of purity, concealment, balance, stability, contentment, and contentment. Wearing a hijab in a married woman’s dream can indicate pregnancy, especially if it is white, pink, or light blue. As for buying a hijab in a married woman’s dream, it is a sign of a future life full of bliss and happiness in all social, financial, emotional, and familial aspects, while removing the hijab means problems and tensions. And marital strife that may lead to divorce. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing the hijab, this is good for her safety and the safety of her fetus, and it may be good news that she will give birth to a boy. The hijab is a symbol of the approaching date of birth. As for seeing the veil being removed in a pregnant woman’s dream, it may indicate a dispute with her husband. Seeing the black veil in a dream is a sign of the purity of the soul, the purity of the heart, the purity of the heart, and a symbol of justice, honesty, truth, and the death of injustice. It can indicate someone seeking knowledge or traveling for Hajj, and the black veil in a dream. A sign of safety and protection from all harm. As for the white veil and seeing it in a dream, it is a sign of happy news and can symbolize engagement or engagement and marriage in one dream. As for the white veil filled with gold, it is a symbol of goodness and living. The white silk veil is a symbol of money, and as for the dream of washing the white veil Spreading it is a sign of purity and integrity. Buying a white veil in a dream is a symbol of marriage or travel. If it is filled with silver, it is a strong indicator of success. A man who sees in a dream a girl he knows who is not veiled while in reality she is veiled is a sign that this person will He does good deeds, but he will not be rewarded by people. It may indicate his marriage to a girl he has never met before, or the imminent marriage of that girl. But if a girl dreams that she is taking off her hijab in front of a strange man, this may indicate a close meeting between her and him that may lead to marriage. As for Taking off the hijab and then putting it back on in the dream is an indication of a change in the situation from negative to positive and from a life full of problems to a peaceful life full of happiness. title: Interpretation of seeing a chicken chick in a dream. Seeing eating a chicken chick with sauce.

preview.html: Interpretation of a chicken chick for a married woman, a single woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether it is roasted or fried. The vision of eating chicken meat and the death of chicks, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a chicken in a dream: A chicken chick in a dream indicates profit in which there is exhaustion and problems. Whoever sees that he is eating raw chicken, he will crush the nobility of the slaves, and chicken meat in general indicates an abundance of money. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about chicks that they symbolize joy, happiness, and freedom from worry. Chicks in a dream also symbolize health and lawful money. Dreams are considered a group of visual situations that a person sees during his sleep, which are usually a reflection of that person’s reality and his present that he always carries. Within its manifestations are many symbols and signs that indicate a group of things that will actually happen in the life of its owner. Between good and bad omens, people are always looking for interpretations of their dreams to know what the future holds for them, so we present to you the interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin from Encyclopedia website.Interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream. The meaning of seeing an old friend in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicated in his book that the interpretation of seeing an old friend in a dream varies according to the psychological state and social circumstances of the dreamer, in addition to his great dependence on the condition of the old friend in the events. . In a dream, happiness is different from sadness or crying, and so on... Seeing an old friend in a dream generally indicates a longing for memories and the past in the dreamer’s soul and his desire to return his life to what it was like in his childhood. Seeing an old friend in a dream means that the dreamer does not He pities his relatives and that he is alone and isolated and does not love his family, friends or acquaintances. Whoever sees in a dream that he sees his old friend in good condition, full of joy and happiness, not worried or sick, this indicates the soonest date of meeting this friend in reality. Whoever sees his old friend In a dream, he is in good health, this indicates that this friend thinks with insight as he thinks about him, and his strong desire to meet him and talk to him. While seeing an old friend sick and feeling pain in the dream indicates that this friend is suffering from fears, problems, and obstacles in his real life. Also, seeing the friend An old person being sick could mean that this person is actually sick and suffers from recurring health crises, and God knows best. Seeing an old friend sick shows his intense need to ask for help from you and those around him, but he does not speak asking for help out of shame or abandonment, and God knows best. To help him get through this stage and overcome the problems he faces these days. Seeing classmates in a dream also indicates that there is great hope in the dreamer’s life that directs him to improve circumstances and achieve what he wants soon. title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing cold and snow in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cold and snow in a dream has many promising connotations and meanings for its owners, and in order to know the negative interpretations of this subject, it is necessary to release the interpretations of scholars on this subject. Seeing cold and snow in a dream. Seeing cold and snow in a dream at the wrong time indicates many problems that he will suffer from in the coming days and will be very sad. If a person sees cold and snow during his sleep, this is a sign that he will find an opportunity to work outside the country, but he He will face many difficulties. If the dreamer sees hail and snow falling on him in his dream, this indicates that he is facing his enemies and is able to resist them with great strength. The dreamer seeing in a dream, hail and snow symbolizes his ability to reach the things he wants after overcoming the obstacles that were in him. His way. Seeing hail and snow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of hail and snow in a dream as a sign that he will lose a lot of money in the coming days, because he cannot deal well with the problems he was facing. If one sees in his dream hail and snow in His home, then this is a sign of the loss of a loved one, and sadness will fall upon everyone after that. If the dreamer during his sleep sees cold and snow falling on him and overwhelming him, this expresses his ability to defeat his enemies and get rid of them once and for all. The dreamer’s vision in a dream about hail and snow in abundance , symbolizes the many money he will receive, which will greatly improve his living situation. Seeing cold and snow in a single woman’s dream Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about cold and snow indicates good things that will happen in her life in the coming days, which will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees While he is sleeping in the cold and snow, this is a sign that he will be able to achieve many things that she dreamed of achieving and she will be proud of herself for what she will achieve. In case the dreamer sees cold and snow in his dream, this means that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from someone who suits her well and she will agree immediately. The vision A girl in her dream about cold and snow symbolizes the positive changes that will occur in her life in the coming days and which she will be very satisfied with. Seeing snow in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees snow in her dream, this is a sign of the happy life that she will enjoy in the coming days as a result of her desire In avoiding anything that makes her feel uncomfortable. If the dreamer sees snow in her dream, this represents her excelling in her studies to a great extent and obtaining the highest grades that make her people very proud of her. Seeing a sleeping girl eating snow symbolizes the abundance of money that she will obtain and will make She lives her life the way she likes. Seeing snow in a dream indicates the happy news that she will receive that will make her very happy. What is the interpretation of seeing snow melting in a single woman’s dream? Seeing a single woman melting snow in her dream indicates her ability to overcome many difficulties that have hindered her life In days

title: The dead in a dream and seeing relatives of the dead, inspired by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream includes multiple meanings, and all the details of a dream about a dead person are important, such as his clothing, appearance, and the way he talks to the dreamer, and was anything given to the dreamer in the dream or taken from him? These precise symbols carry many important interpretations for the dreamer, and in the following paragraphs we will show you the most important things that Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi said about this vision. Their desires, and the dream may indicate God’s wrath upon the dreamer if he sees a dead person. An unbelieving person in his dream, and he talks to him at length, but this is not the only meaning of seeing the dead, and the most important visions that dreamers see are summarized in the following points: Smiling dead: The smile of the deceased, whether he was a relative or a stranger. For the first time the dreamer sees it in his dream, the vision shows wealth. Kindness and many good things that accompany the dreamer in his life. The dead person goes to Hajj: When one sees in a dream that the deceased performs the rituals of Hajj, he died in obedience to God, and because of his many deeds in this world, God gave him a high position in Paradise, and the dream may indicate either The dreamer's marriage or marriage. If he is performing Hajj, especially if he sees that he went to perform Hajj with the dead, then he returns to his home again. The dead group asks the dreamer: When the dreamer sees two dead people asking about him by name, and they stand at the door of his house and wait for him to come out and take it and leave, then death is approaching and the dreamer will leave life. As quickly as possible. The deceased is sick and needs medicine: The deceased’s illness is evidence of his disobedience to God in this world, and the medicine he seeks is evidence of his need for alms and supplication, and the dreamer giving medicine to the dead is evidence that he gave him a lot of charity. Until God stops torturing this dead person and provides him with safety and stability in his grave. The dead person is hungry and asks for food. When the dead person is hungry in a dream, this is evidence that his family has forgotten about him, and has not fulfilled their duty towards him in terms of supplication and zakat, and if the fortuneteller gives him food, then the dream shows a message It is addressed to the dreamer and must be applied, provided that the deceased asks for alms on his behalf and not from anyone else, and he must do so. The dead person in a dream by Ibn SirinThe dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates good news and warnings according to what he said to the dreamer in the dream. When the dead person embraces the monarch in a dream, and the embrace continues For a long time, this is a long and happy life for the monarch, provided that he does not refuse to embrace this deceased, or if he feels upset and despised. If the deceased was seen in the dream admonishing the dreamer and the dreamer was a good listener to this advice, then the vision indicates a clear modification in the dreamer’s behavior as he seeks forgiveness from the Lord of the Worlds and turns to Him and leaves the path of fallacy that has continued for many years. The dead in the dream of single peopleWhen the dreamer hears her mother’s voice The deceased or her father is screaming for help, but he did not see him in the dream. He is tormented and asks her to save him from this torment with her good deeds.

title: Interpretation of seeing a hijab in a dream: wearing a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the veil for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, black or white, taking off the dress, buying a new torn, old colored one for a man, according to Ibn Sirin. The veil is a symbol of purity and concealment if it appears in a woman's dream, while it is a sign of good luck in a man's dream. In general, seeing the veil in a dream is a good thing, as it is evidence of calm, stability, living and money, especially if that veil is made of silk. The veil in the dream of an unmarried girl is a strong indication that she will get married soon, especially if the color of this veil is white. Seeing single women wearing the veil is a symbol of success and upcoming positive change. The veil can also indicate the purity of her heart and the purity of her soul, while buying the veil in a dream is a sign of a close connection, and seeing the removal of the veil symbolizes separation or failure. As for the married woman, seeing the veil in her dream is a sign and symbol of purity, concealment, balance, stability, contentment and satisfaction. Wearing a veil in a married woman's dream can indicate pregnancy, especially if it is white, pink or light blue. As for buying a veil in a married woman's dream, it is a sign of a future life full of bliss and happiness in all social, financial, emotional and family aspects. As for removing the veil, it means problems, tensions and marital strife that may lead to divorce. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a veil, this is good for her safety and the safety of her fetus, and it may be good news that she will give birth to a boy. The veil is a symbol of the approaching date of birth. As for seeing the veil being taken off in a pregnant woman’s dream, it may indicate a disagreement with the husband. Seeing the black veil in a dream is a sign of purity of the soul, purity of the heart, purity of the heart, and a symbol of justice, honesty, truth, and the death of injustice. It can refer to someone who seeks knowledge or travels for Hajj. The black veil in a dream is a sign of safety and protection from all harm. As for the white veil and seeing it in a dream, it is a sign of happy news and can symbolize engagement or engagement and marriage in one dream. As for the white veil filled with gold, it is a symbol of goodness and living. The white silk veil is a symbol of money, and the dream of washing the white veil and spreading it is a sign of purity and integrity. Buying a white veil in a dream is a symbol of marriage or travel, if it is occupied with silver, and it is a strong indication of success. A man who sees in a dream a girl he knows without a veil while she is in reality veiled is a sign that this person will do a good deed but will not be rewarded by people. It may indicate his marriage to a girl he has never met before, or to the imminent marriage of that girl. As for if a girl dreams that she is taking off her veil in front of a man Strange, it may indicate a close meeting between her and him that may lead to marriage. As for taking off the veil and then putting it back on in a dream, it is an indication of a change in the situation from negative to positive and from a life full of problems to a peaceful life full of happiness.
